title: Pre-30 matchmaking is hilarious

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
HAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAH

all 5 of us just opened as soon as we saw what the match was. Absolutely funny.

Apparently if your pre-30 mmr (im guessing 2900ish is about d5-d4?) gets high enough, it'll put you against premade diamond 5s while you have 2 tier 3 runes. Fantastic!

replies.body:
I almost never see sub-30s, is this a blind pick thing?

Lots of people resting on the laurels of season 3/ their bought account.

fizz probably bought his account but no one else had.

It was normal draft pick on my lvl 24 account, it actually thinks my normal mmr is like diamond 3. my queue times put me at almost 6 minutes, at 2-3 am it can go up to 10

on an account thats lvl 20, with much lower mmr (all bot games), it takes less than 1.5 minutes for draft, obviously this should even go down with level gain.

Every. Single. Thing. About pre-30 is terrible. It is done so horribly im simply baffled there are even any new players coming into the game at all.

The leveling is horrible. The matchmaking is horrible. The IP/RP system is horrible. The IP costs are crippling. The champion rotations are very limited and in some cases actually malicious to learning. It is the absolute worst I've seen from any game besides sc2. That isn't saying much, since that game made it very clear it didn't even want casual players.
8:48 seconds. the jayce didn't open but he might as well have been. Even the enemy team was like "what the fuck."
